domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text:
@CNN DOUBLE FOR UR TROUBLE

Is coming this flu season.
Not only will we have to deal w the flu, but also cov.

It's gonna be a double whammy. Two coronavirus
At the same time will be hard to combat

Hospitals will be overwhelmed & doctors 
Overworked.  It will be 
Bad & unprecedented!
